verbs.description: Donald Trump [V: wo] n't release his tax returns on the altogether bogus grounds that he is barred from public disclosure by an IRS audit .
[ARG0: Donald Trump] [ARGM-MOD: wo] [ARGM-NEG: n't] [V: release] [ARG1: his tax returns] [ARGM-CAU: on the altogether bogus grounds that he is barred from public disclosure by an IRS audit] .
Donald Trump wo n't release his tax returns on the altogether bogus grounds that he [V: is] barred from public disclosure by an IRS audit .
Donald Trump wo n't release his tax returns on the altogether bogus grounds that [ARG1: he] is [V: barred] [ARG2: from public disclosure] [ARG0: by an IRS audit] .
